Html: I would like to generate XML of a profile for import into Rawr or SimC. Is XML schema available? or some sort of documentation? or should I go directly to the source code?

There is no scheme, it's autogenerated by the XML serialization of the Character class. Read an export from the Rawr addon and a saved Character.xml to see how we save/load in stuff.

Edit: You actually don't need a whole lot to get a toon loadable into Rawr, even though a saved character file has a ton of data in it.
XML profile does not include reforging, does it?
Each point where you see an item string does have reforging, yes
